rows.name:
If you have two Blades, be sure to
switch between them regularly.
It'll broaden your options in battle!

Have you ever seen a unique monster?
Apparently each one has a fearsome
nickname of its very own.

I did spot one once, but I wasn't fool
enough to go near it. I've heard way too
many horror stories about those beasts!
See anything untoward?

The monsters always stay clear of the
camp, so we should be safe.

Remember, we're here in pursuit of the
Aegis. Be ready for combat at all times.
Aye-aye, sir!

Our orders are to stand by in Gula
for the time being. We could be called
on at any time, so stay prepared.
Sir, yes, sir!

We must be ready to set sail at
a moment's notice.

Another lead that amounted to nothing!
How are we supposed to track down
the Aegis at this rate?!

Dispatching this Divine Beast warship isn't a
measure to be taken lightly. We'll just
have to await word from the homeland.

Surely we should set sail for Iira
at once. They require our aid!

I'm afraid not. If we enter Iiran
territory without official orders, we risk
being mistaken for an invading force.

So the time has finally come to set sail
for Iira! Let's show them what the
Superbian military is capable of!

There are still preparations to be
made before we can depart.
I beg you, please calm yourself...

Remember, our aim is to capture the
Coeian troops wherever possible.
And we want their equipment intact.

That's easier said than done, I'm afraid.
Most of them don't surrender easily...

Ah! Lord Hugo!
It's so good to see you're safe!

When we received word that Aurium
had been attacked by the Aegis, we
feared the very worst!

Hugo-sama! We've almost completed
the preparations to set sail for Iira.

The battle against the Aegis will
not be easy... We will do everything
in our power to assist you.
